src:
V lov za boljšo ozimnico
02 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Aleš Sorta

Nogometni drugoligaši bodo ta konec tedna naredili glavni obrat v letošnji sezoni. Novembra jih čakajo štirje delovni vikendi, kar pomeni, da bodo pred spomladanskim nadaljevanjem odigrali kar 19 od skupno 30 krogov.



Koprčani (v rumenih dresih) bodo po pokalnem izzivu jutri na Bonifiki v boju za prvenstvene točke gostili novomeško Krko. Foto: Tomaž Primožič/FPA

NOVA GORICA > Novembra bo torej v igri še 12 točk, kar bi lahko razjasnilo ali pa zameglilo razmerja moči na lestvici. V nogometu in športu nasploh vendarle ne gre prehitevati dogodkov ali vnaprej razglašati zmagovalcev in poražencev. Ozimnica bo vsekakor določila spomladanska izhodišča, a tudi poteze v januarskem prestopnem roku. Ambiciozni klubi pri tem razmišljajo in delujejo tudi korak ali dva naprej. Vodilni Koper sodi v ta rang, pri čemer bo poskusil upravičiti svoj status najprej na igrišču. Po zaključku pokalne zgodbe, ki bi se lahko razpletla tudi drugače, je ciljna osredotočenost jasna.
Prvi tekmec izbrancev Mirana Srebrniča v drugem delu prvenstvene sezone bo Krka. Z Novomeščani imajo še neporavnane račune iz uvodnega kroga, ko so zapravili vodstvo 2:0 in se morali zadovoljiti s točko, ki bo jutri gotovo premalo. Je pa svoj davek vzela pokalna tekma z Aluminijem. Zaradi pretrgane stranske kolenske križne vezi je že konec jesenskega dela sezone za Ivico Guberca, težave z mišico pa imaGoran Galešić.
Enaka ugotovitev velja za Novogoričane, ki so po zmagovitem nizu iztržili manj od pričakovanj. Trener Borivoje Lučić bi si bržkone želel širšega igralskega nabora tako na tekmah kot treningih. Na nekaterih mestih nima menjav kaj šele ustrezne konkurence, kar se na daljši rok ob kartonih in poškodbah pozna. Prvenstvo pa je tek na dolge proge. Kakorkoli, moštvena podoba na igrišču ni takšna, kot bi si želeli, pomisleki pa so tudi za prihodnost, ki je vezana na vprašljive denarne prilive. Tudi sicer se zdi, da celotna klubska slika na Goriškem sproža prej kot ne ravnodušnost. Vrnitev na zmagovite tirnice ob današnjem gostovanju v Beltincih in teden dni kasneje na domači tekmi z Dravogradom bi vendarle spet nekoliko ogrela ozračje pred obračunom s Koprom na Bonifiki. Na srečo primorskih klubov z vrha njuna konkurenca še bistveno bolj niha. Polfinalisti pokalnega tekmovanja, Radomljani, so nanizali tri poraze, jutri pa bodo ob napovedani deževni nedelji soočeni še z zahtevnim domačim obračunom s Krškim. Tudi Lendavčane čaka po sredinem pokalnem izzivu danes vse prej kot lahka naloga v Brežicah. Gostitelji že tri tekme niso prejeli gola. Ne nazadnje brežiških vrat niso mogli ogroziti niti Novogoričani, ki so na predhodnih dvobojih to jesen vselej zatresli mrežo tekmeca,
Tekmovalni razpored bi lahko šel na roko Biljencem. Jutri bodo gostili Rogaško, ki vendarle ni v tako brezupnem položaju, kot je kazalo na začetku jeseni. Ta čas ima enako točkovno izhodišče kot Brda, s katerimi mora še odigrati zaostalo tekmo 7. kroga. Brice pa čaka danes še eden v nizu dvobojev proti neposrednim tekmecem za obstanek v ligi, v Dravogradu. Bolj spokojni so lahko Dekančani, ki se bodo danes podali na Ptuj.
text:
Hunting for a better winter
02 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Aleš Sorta

The sophomore footballers will make a major turn this weekend this season. Four working weekends await them in November, meaning that as many as 19 of the 30 rounds will be played before the spring resumption.



After the cup challenge, the Koprcans (in yellow jerseys) will host Krka in Novo mesto tomorrow in the fight for the championship points. Photo: Tomaz Primozic / FPA

NOVA GORICA> In November, therefore, there will be 12 points left in the game, which could clarify or blur the power relations on the scale. In football and sports, however, there is no need to overtake events or announce winners and losers in advance. The winter camp will definitely determine the spring baselines, but also the moves in the January deadline. Ambitious clubs are thinking about this and are also taking a step or two further. Leading Koper is in this rank, trying to justify his status first on the pitch. After completing a trophy story that could be untwisted, the focus is clear.
Krka will be the first competitor of Miran Srebrnic in the second part of the championship season. With Novomestani they still have outstanding bills from the opening round, when they lost the lead 2-0 and have to settle for a point that will surely not be enough tomorrow. However, the Alumni Cup match took its toll. Due to a torn knee lateral ligament, Ivica Guberc is already at the end of the autumn part of the season, and Goran Galesic has muscle problems.
The same conclusion applies to the people of Novogorica who, after the winning streak, performed less than expected. Coach Borivoje Lučić would probably like a wider set of players in both matches and training sessions. In some places, there is no competition, let alone adequate competition, which is known in the long run with cardboard and damage. The championship, however, is a long distance race. Either way, the team image on the pitch is not what you want it to be, and there are also concerns about a future that is tied to questionable cash inflows. Even so, the whole club image in Gorizia seems to provoke rather than indifference. Returning to the winning tracks with today's Beltinci tour and a week later in a home game with Dravograd would, however, again warm the atmosphere a bit before the showdown with Koper on Bonifica. Fortunately for coastal clubs from the top, their competition is much more fluctuating. The semi-finalists of the Cup competition, Radomljani, have suffered three defeats, and tomorrow, on the rainy Sunday, they will face a challenging domestic showdown with Krško. Even the Lendavans are waiting for the mid-cup challenge today as an easy task in Brežice. The hosts have not scored a goal in three matches. Last but not least, the Novogoricians, who have always shattered their rivals' net in the previous matches, could not be threatened by the Brežice gates,
The competition schedule could go hand in hand with the Cubs. Tomorrow they will host Rogaška, which is not in the hopeless situation, as it was at the beginning of autumn. This time has the same starting point as Brda, with which he still has to play the backlog of the 7th round. Brice, however, awaits today another in a series of duels against direct rivals to stay in the league, in Dravograd. More serene may be the Deans who will go to Ptuj today.
